name: Pangolin Cassowary (Demo 2)
description:
Pangolin Cassowary is classic-inspired 3d platformer with physics-based traversal. So far there is only one level.

Tips:
There's currently a bug on mac where the objectives menu thinks you have collected all the chips when you haven't yet, so I guess that's a freebie.
If you're playing on keyboard "press start" means "press enter".
Ps4 controllers might not work.

Controls: (controller very much recommended.)
Left analog (or wasd) to move.
Right analog (or arrows) to rotate the camera.
South or East face button (or space) to kick Pangolin.
North and West face buttons (or Q and E) to adjust kicking arch.
To pause press Start (or enter/return)

Game by me (@ocotilloisland)
Lovely character artwork in icon and key art by Abdul (@3buddy)

Please feel free to leave feedback. I'd love to hear what you liked or what you think could make the game better.
